## Workspace.getActiveFile() method

Returns the file for the current view if it's a FileView.

Otherwise, it will recent the most recently active file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getActiveFile(): TFile | null;
```
**Returns:**

[TFile](./obsidian.tfile.md) \| null
